name: St. Andrews 2003
description:
Isla Greenlaw  returns to her childhood home to find out about her traumatic past and strange things start to take place.

You will have to investigate Greenlaw's family old house walking through the different zones in the house.

Our main character, against her psychologist's advice, decides to go to the home where she spent her childhood to overcome her fears. During the adventure, Isla will have to face her old fears and find a way to make it out alive.
